reviewText: Chris Hardwick is hilarious wherever he shows up be it on The Talking Dead, Chelsea Lately, Attack of the Show (RIP), and, of course, his own stand-up special, which covers a an array of situations anybody who considers themselves geeky will have experienced. LOLed quite a few times as did my friend who was watching it with me. Nerds rule the world and Chris Hardwick is our official jester!
summary: Mandroid: for the manic nerdbot within us all
Title: N/A

reviewText: Chris Hardwick embraces his Nerdishness, and we the fans love it! This is a hysterical comedy show and it makes me proud to be a Nerd! Watch this, watch @Midnight and the Nerdist, and rejoice in being a NERD!
summary: The Leader of the Nerdist RULES!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This man is so funny.  He is the host of Talking Dead and he lets us into his world and it is warped.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Fantastic fun. He speaks to (or for) the nerd inside of me. Proud to be different. Embrace who you are and split your sides laughing.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I watched this at first on Comedy Central when they showed the special on Tv. I knew that almost all comedy videos had stuff that had been taken out due to the maturity rating, so I had to get this DVD to see what else Chris had said.My husband and I both love this DVD, and the extras are really fun. The extras include a couple of songs from Chris' musical group, Hard and Phirm, which is a real treat.
Title: N/A

reviewText: BUT THE DVD COULD BE MORE FUNNY. HARDWICK IS MY KINDA NERD. HE MAKES ME GIGGLE QUITE A BIT. HA
Title: N/A
